Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin

Posts.Content: iÂ  am on femara and have chest pain and pressure choking sensations and coughing a lot. i have been on it now for 2 and a half months. i did not take it one day and felt better no chest pain or pressure nor coughing. has anyone else had this symptom?
Posts.Title: femara and chest pain
